XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle local/smartmedia to track smart media conversions

TABLE.NAME: local_smartmedia_data
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains data about Moodle multimedia files

FIELD.NAME: contenthash
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle contenthash of the file

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: The duration of the file

FIELD.NAME: bitrate
FIELD.COMMENT: Total bitrate of the file

FIELD.NAME: size
FIELD.COMMENT: Total size of the file in bytes

FIELD.NAME: videostreams
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of video streams in file

FIELD.NAME: audiostreams
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of audio streams in file

FIELD.NAME: width
FIELD.COMMENT: Width of primary video stream if it exists

FIELD.NAME: height
FIELD.COMMENT: Height of primary video stream if it exists

FIELD.NAME: metadata
FIELD.COMMENT: Full extracted metadata in json format

TABLE.NAME: local_smartmedia_conv
TABLE.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle local/smartmedia to track smart media conversions.

FIELD.NAME: pathnamehash
FIELD.COMMENT: complete file path sha1 hash - unique for each file

FIELD.NAME: contenthash
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle contenthash of the file

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The processing status of the record.

FIELD.NAME: transcribe
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the conversion process include automated transcription

FIELD.NAME: rekog_label
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the conversion process include label recognition

FIELD.NAME: rekog_moderation
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the conversion process include moderation detection

FIELD.NAME: rekog_face
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the conversion process include face detection

FIELD.NAME: rekog_person
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the conversion process include person tracking

FIELD.NAME: detect_sentiment
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the conversion process include sentiment detection

FIELD.NAME: detect_phrases
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the conversion process include phrase detection

FIELD.NAME: detect_entities
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the conversion process include entity detection

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when record was last modified

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when record processing was completed

TABLE.NAME: local_smartmedia_presets
TABLE.COMMENT: The AWS Elastic Transcoder presets that were used to convert this file There is a many to one relationship with the local_smartmedia_conv table

FIELD.NAME: convid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the corresponding record in the smartmedia conversion table

TABLE.NAME: local_smartmedia_queue_msgs
TABLE.COMMENT: Messages retrieved from the AWS SQS queue. Used in processing of pending conversions

FIELD.NAME: objectkey
FIELD.COMMENT: The key of the object in the AWS S3 input bucket. This will be the same as the contenthash from the Moodle file table.

FIELD.NAME: process
FIELD.COMMENT: The AWS process the message pertains to

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status code of the message

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: The full message

FIELD.NAME: senttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the message was sent to the queue

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when this record was created
